issues.description: The template declares the function symbol as global ("global fix_vec_sub_asm"), but the solution uses an extern declaration ("extern fix_vec_sub_asm") instead of exporting it. This visibility mismatch may confuse students about whether to mark their function definitions as global or extern when following the solution reference.
issues.suggested_fix: In the solution repository, replace the extern declaration with a global directive (i.e., change "extern fix_vec_sub_asm" to "global fix_vec_sub_asm") so that the function symbol is consistently exported as in the template.
